classes.name: Barbarian
classes.description: A fierce warrior of primitive background who can enter a battle rage

classes.name: Bard
classes.description: An inspiring magician whose power echoes the music of creation

classes.name: Cleric
classes.description: A priestly champion who wields divine magic in service of a higher power

classes.name: Druid
classes.description: A priest of the Old Faith, wielding the powers of nature and adopting animal forms

classes.name: Fighter
classes.description: A master of martial combat, skilled with a variety of weapons and armor

classes.name: Monk
classes.description: A master of martial arts, harnessing the power of the body in pursuit of physical and spiritual perfection

classes.name: Paladin
classes.description: A holy warrior bound to a sacred oath

classes.name: Ranger
classes.description: A warrior who combats threats on the edges of civilization

classes.name: Rogue
classes.description: A scoundrel who uses stealth and trickery to overcome obstacles and enemies

classes.name: Sorcerer
classes.description: A spellcaster who draws on inherent magic from a gift or bloodline

classes.name: Warlock
classes.description: A wielder of magic that is derived from a bargain with an extraplanar entity

classes.name: Wizard
classes.description: A scholarly magic-user capable of manipulating the structures of reality

races.traits: +2 Strength, +1 Charisma, Draconic Ancestry, Breath Weapon, Damage Resistance
races.description: Dragonborn look very much like dragons standing erect in humanoid form, though they lack wings or a tail.
races.name: Dragonborn

races.traits: +2 Constitution, Darkvision, Dwarven Resilience, Dwarven Combat Training, Stonecunning
races.description: Bold and hardy, dwarves are known as skilled warriors, miners, and workers of stone and metal.
races.name: Dwarf

races.traits: +2 Dexterity, Darkvision, Keen Senses, Fey Ancestry, Trance
races.description: Elves are a magical people of otherworldly grace, living in the world but not entirely part of it.
races.name: Elf

races.description: A gnomes energy and enthusiasm for living shines through every inch of his or her tiny body.
races.name: Gnome

races.traits: +2 Charisma, +1 to Two Other Ability Scores, Darkvision, Fey Ancestry, Skill Versatility
races.description: Half-elves combine what some say are the best qualities of their elf and human parents.
races.name: Half-Elf

races.description: The diminutive halflings survive in a world full of larger creatures by avoiding notice or, barring that, avoiding offense.
races.name: Halfling

races.traits: +2 Strength, +1 Constitution, Darkvision, Menacing, Relentless Endurance, Savage Attacks
races.description: Half-orcs grayish pigmentation, sloping foreheads, jutting jaws, prominent teeth, and towering builds make their orcish heritage plain for all to see.
races.name: Half-Orc

races.traits: +1 to All Ability Scores, Extra Language
races.description: Humans are the most adaptable and ambitious people among the common races. Whatever drives them, humans are the innovators, the achievers, and the pioneers of the worlds.
races.name: Human

races.traits: +2 Charisma, +1 Intelligence, Darkvision, Hellish Resistance, Infernal Legacy
races.description: To be greeted with stares and whispers, to suffer violence and insult on the street, to see mistrust and fear in every eye: this is the lot of the tiefling.
races.name: Tiefling
